I am software / devops engineer with a Ruby on Rails & AWS background. As a backend RoR developer I spent so much of my time with the Operations & infrastructure team, that I ended up joining them.

I’ve spent the last 5 years developing & maintaining the VA.gov website. Before that, I dabbled in some Android mobile development and was a Java engineer who worked for RSA Security.

I’ve tinkered with computers my entire life - both building them and developing software.
